combat1.name: Normal Attack: Dough-Fu
combat1.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
combat1.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Guoba Attack
combat2.descriptionRaw: Summons Guoba, who will continuously breathe fire at opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. Guoba loves to eat spicy food. Problem is, his stomach can't handle something this spicy.
combat2.description: Summons Guoba, who will continuously breathe fire at opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
combat2.flavorText: Guoba loves to eat spicy food. Problem is, his stomach can't handle something this spicy.

combat3.name: Pyronado
combat3.descriptionRaw: Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her. The Pyronado will move with your character for the ability's duration, dealing Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path. There will never be enough heat. Never.
combat3.description:
Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her.
The Pyronado will move with your character for the ability's duration, dealing Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path.
combat3.flavorText: There will never be enough heat. Never.

passive1.name: Crossfire
passive1.descriptionRaw: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.
passive1.description: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.

passive2.name: Beware, It's Super Hot!
passive2.descriptionRaw: When <color=#FFD780FF>Guoba Attack</color>'s effect ends, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.
passive2.description: When Guoba Attack's effect ends, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.

passive3.name: Chef de Cuisine
passive3.descriptionRaw: When Xiangling cooks an ATK-boosting dish perfectly, she has a 12% chance to receive double the product.
passive3.description: When Xiangling cooks an ATK-boosting dish perfectly, she has a 12% chance to receive double the product.
